intro: Bubble up, merge the colors, unlock the fun!
description:
Dive into a world of color and strategy with Boba Tea Merge, now on Nintendo Switch™! Drop vibrant tapioca pearls (bubbles) into the tank and watch as matching colors merge into bigger, brand-new shades. The challenge? Don’t let any pearls fall out of the tank - if one does, it’s game over!

How to Play:
- Drop colorful pearls into the tank.
- Merge pearls of the same color to create larger, new-colored bubbles.
- Complete each level to fill your cup with delicious boba tea.
- When your cup is full, unlock a fun new lid to customize your drink!

Features:
- Addictive, easy-to-learn gameplay perfect for all ages.
- Satisfying color-matching and merging mechanics.
- Unlockable lids and visual upgrades as you progress.
- Play at your own pace—relax or challenge yourself for the highest score!

Can you master the art of boba and unlock every lid? Pour, merge, and sip your way to boba tea perfection!
